ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will impose a weighty Word upon you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We shall soon entrust to you a message heavy (with solemnity).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Behold, We shall cast upon you a Weighty Word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We are about to reveal to you a mighty word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We shall soon ordain a heavy responsibility upon you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We shall send down to you a Word Thaqil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We will make to light upon you a weighty Word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Behold, We shall cast upon thee a weighty word;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For we shall charge thee with a word of weight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For We are about to send down to you a message of considerable gravity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! anon We shall cast upon thee a weighty word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed soon We shall cast on you a weighty discourse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Soon shall We send down to thee a weighty Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We shall send down to you a weighty Word (i.e. obligations, legal laws, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We are about to cast upon you a weighty Word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We are about to give you a heavy message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:5] Verily [soon] We shall cast on you a weighty, an awe-inspiring or stern, word, [a weighty] Qur’ān, because of the prescriptions [imposed] in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For We shall charge thee) for We shall send you Gabriel (with a word of weight) with mighty words containing commands and prohibitions, promises and threats, the lawful and unlawful; it is also said this means: with a tremendous word; and it is also said this means: a word that is heavy on whoever contravenes it; and it is also said this means: a weighty word in the prayer of the night.
